dct_title_s: Poli Arctici, et circumiacentium terrarum descriptio novissima
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Publication date from Burden. Includes decorative cartouches and illustrations of whaling in margins. Historic Maps copy varies slightly from copy described by Kershaw. From: Atlas [Zeekarten]. Tot Amsterdam : bij Frederick de Wit in de Calverstraet bij den Dam inde Witte Paskaert, [1676?]
dct_publisher_sm: Gedruckt 't Amsteldam : by Frederick de Wit in de Calverstraet aen den Dam in Witte Pascaert , [ca. 1676]
